definition: ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: The draft has been handed to the bank on clean collection.
sentences.chinese: 汇票曾经交银止按光票托收。

sentences.english: We can't agree to draw at 30 days D/A.
sentences.chinese: 我们不同意开具30天期的承兑交单汇票。

sentences.english: Please remit promptly by money order.
sentences.chinese: 请速将款项用汇票汇来。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Shanghai by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: He went to bank to encash a draft.
sentences.chinese: 他去银行兑现一张汇票。

sentences.english: Can I have this money order cashed?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在这里兑现这张汇票吗？

sentences.english: The payer of an ECD shall be the acceptor.
sentences.chinese: 电子商业汇票的付款人为承兑人。

sentences.english: The matter that will register on bank draft is best and whole plan come down for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 将银行汇票上登记的事项最好全部计下来备查。

sentences.english: Our terms of payment are normally 30 - day bill of exchange, documents against acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 我们的付款方式一般是30天远期汇票，承兑交单。

sentences.english: Before Amazon will send out the order, you must send your payment.
sentences.chinese: 汇票或支票必须在亚马逊发出订单之前送出。

sentences.english: The obligation of the acceptor thereof arises out of the purchase of goods from the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 本汇票承兑人的义务因向出票人购买货物而产生。

sentences.english: Drafts must be presented to the negotiating (or drawee)bank not later than Oct.10 ,2004.
sentences.chinese: 汇票不得迟于2004年10月10日议付。

sentences.english: I. M. O. is very convenient to you, because it is completely on the spot .
sentences.chinese: 国际汇票非常方便，因为它当场填写。

sentences.english: Article XII out the vote on the bill, after missing its date of payment.
sentences.chinese: 第十二条出票后付款之汇票上漏填日期。

sentences.english: BL and draft belong to the same category?
sentences.chinese: 提货单和汇票属于同一范畴了？

sentences.english: I need a fifty-dollar postal order, please.
sentences.chinese: 你能替我兑现这张邮政汇票吗？

definition: to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment
